title: Невеста. Экстра любовь
overview: A new show in which psychic Konstantin Getsati will go in search of his destiny. Always reserved and fair, tall, handsome and noble, Konstantin Getsati after winning the 18th season of "Battle of the Psychics" became the dream of thousands of girls across the country. But so far none of them has not been able to take a worthy place in his heart.Several thousand applications were submitted for casting in the new project. But to get acquainted with Konstantin Getsati will be able only 26 girls. After the first meeting Konstantin will choose 16 applicants, among whom he will look for his second half in hot and mystical Morocco. Unbelievable locations, beautiful dates and, of course, the magic of love await the audience.What qualities should a psychic bride possess? Should she also have mystical abilities? How can you melt the heart of an Alanian psychic? And will Konstantin Getsati be able to discern his other half?
